Package elki.distance

Interface IndexBasedDistance<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Distance<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexBasedDistance, SharedNearestNeighborJaccardDistance
    public interface IndexBasedDistance<O>
extends Distance<O>
    Distance function relying on an index (such as preprocessed neighborhoods).

    0.3
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
